content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────
### Extraction System at Position(-3.5, 27.5)
Consists of:
– Extraction system burner inserter at Position(-3.5, 27.5) with drop position Position(-3.5, 28.5)

### Copper Cable Factory Interface at Position(2.5, 17.5)
Consists of:
– New factory burner inserter at Position(2.5, 16.5)
– Dedicated burner inserter at Position(3.5, 17.5) placed using direction RIGHT
– Cable factory input chest at Position(2.5, 17.5)
– (Linked neighbor: Assembling-machine-1 at Position(1.5, 19.5))

### Depot Belt Connection at Position(3.5, 15.5)
Consists of:
– Belt depot wooden chest at Position(3.5, 15.5) (crafted and successfully placed)
– Adjacent transport belt segment at Position(4.5, 15.5)
– Depot burner inserter at Position(3.5, 14.5) placed using direction UP

### Electricity Generator at Position(-0.5, 24.5)
Consists of:
– Steam engine (named “steam-engine”) at Position(-0.5, 24.5)
– Boiler at Position(-5.5, 24.0)
– Offshore pump at Position(-7.5, 25.5)

ERROR TIPS
──────────
– Transport Belt Connection Errors
  • Always use an inserter as the target when connecting transport belts. Avoid targeting a steam engine directly; add an inserter to input items into the steam engine instead.

– Entity Placement Errors (Wooden Chest)
  • Ensure the player moves close enough to the target position before placing an entity to satisfy distance constraints.
  • Check that variables (e.g. the target reference for the chest) are properly defined to prevent NameErrors.
  • Verify that the required item (wooden chest) is available in inventory before attempting placement.
